ygData.subject: Re: najena faction
ygData.msgSnippet: is it even possible to have good najena faction? i ve never seen a positive adjustment. as a side note, i ve never killed a mistmoore npc but i have killed
ygData.messageBody:
is it even possible to have good najena faction? i've never seen a positive
adjustment.

as a side note, i've never killed a mistmoore npc but i have killed easily
100+ bards for +MayongMistmoore hits. i am still 100% kos, scowls at you
ready to attack in MistMoore. the faction there is broken imo. also, when i
went to turn the parts in mistmoore: first, a shadowy scribe cast force
shocked me to death through a wall as i was leaving. second, after i
collected my body i made my way all the way to the castle gates...the guards
were positioned in such a way that my troll absolutely could not fit past
them. though i did manage to get stuck in a crouch position between
them...then watched as my invis died. needless to say, i died shortly after.

so, if you go to mistmoree bring a rescue group and bind in gfay (i was
bound in grobb) as the zone is bugged to hell and back.

kg


>From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: [shadowknight] najena faction
>Date: Tue, 2 Nov 1999 15:13:02 -0600
>
>luckily, the undead knight (the guy who makes shadow knight armor) has
>temple of solusek ro faction, NOT najena faction. so you can kill stuff in
>najena to your hearts content and he'll still like you. HOWEVER, since he
>appears in drelzna's room... it would be nice to have high najena faction
>so
>you can survive the trip down there a bit more easily!
>
>Beld Demonblade
>Fennin Ro
>
